Updating Checkmk and using multiple instances

div.p: The beta test of Checkmk 2.3.0 has started — and thus an important milestone has been reached before the official release. Checkmk 2.3.0 Checkmk 2.3.0 contains many detail improvements, performance optimizations and new features. Help to make Checkmk 2.3.0 the best Checkmk version ever by testing Checkmk 2.3.0 Beta and reporting bugs or anomalies.

Participation in the beta test is possible without completely replacing a productive site. The omd command allows you to create additional sites for testing alongside a production site — either from scratch or as a copy of an existing Checkmk site. Baris shows how to update and work with multiple sites installed in parallel in the embedded video.

Of course, we would be delighted if you could share your experiences — problems as well as positive impressions — with us. The most important feedback channels for this are the forum and the feedback email inbox. Especially during the beta phase of Checkmk 2.3.0, developers, consultants and the manual team are also increasingly present in the forum. Users with a support contract can use the Service Desk Beta, which is of course free of charge.
